entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Vaughan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:14 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 02:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

Wind: NNW 9 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
